name: objectcache
description: Flushes an object cache or returns the current size.

params.name: type
params.description:
cache type to manipulate

- function
- include
- object
- query
- resource
- template

params.name: filter
params.description: filter for the elements to delete

params.name: filterignorecase
params.description: filter for the elements to delete

params.name: result
params.description: name for variables for action size
